title: When is the next patch due?

replies.body: The next patch will be 28/01/16 around 06:00am AEST according to the Service Status.

> [{quoted}](name=Area2609,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EqeEAbfq,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-27T04:19:25.661+0000)
>
> The next patch will be 28/01/16 around 06:00am AEST according to the Service Status.

6 am is early i love it
Thank you guys :D really appreciate the replies :D
dont they normally apply patches at 11:59

They told us a long time ago that it would patch on wednesdays for us.... 

i think its patched only twice on wednesday since then...

(in other words, supposed to be today, but doesn't seem like it will be)

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EqeEAbfq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-26T20:56:27.268+0000)

> i think its patched only twice on wednesday since then...
